entry.title: Dynamically Controlled Bitcoin Block Size Max Cap
entry.summary: In a repeated message on a list, it has been stated that the consensus rule of maximum block size is limiting mining centralization, which is currently in a bad state. However, instead of posting such messages with baseless claims, there is a need to work on a decentralization metric that can be pointed out. The writer suggests that attacking people who disagree is not the solution and it is important to come up with a concrete plan to address the issue.
